Interview with Tobias Lutke of Shopify

Posted by marcel

The decidedly right-brained Amy Hoy sat down for an interview with with core member and Rails old-timer Tobias Lütke. They talk about Jaded Pixel’s greatly anticipated Shopify as well as its theme builder, Vision. Maybe Amy will start doing interviews like this more often…
